Taylor Ward homered in his third straight game
Bobby Miller yielded seven runs on five hits, including three homers

Taylor Ward extended his hitting streak to a career-best and current AL-best 14 games
Manager Ron Washington praised Griffin Canning's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Angels' first five batters reached base and scored
The game went into the eighth inning with the Angels leading 10-1
